Content-Type: text/plain
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Should the artifact pieces give their 
controller additional powers? (like 
slight energon absorbtion, increased 
shock resistance, strength boost, 
weapon powerup, something like that) 

  o One power is enough. 
  o Several powers would be better. 
  o No powers, the 4 together should be the only thing that causes power. 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=956099  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
